setter.label: Setter
setter.name: setter
setter.hint: To prevent any setting except via an explicit setter function, set this to false

column.label: Column
column.name: column
column.hint: Use when the property name is not the same as the table column name

ormtype.label: ORMType
ormtype.name: ormtype
ormtype.hint: Used to designate a Hibernate/database-engine-agnostic data type.

sqltype.label: SQLType
sqltype.name: sqltype
sqltype.hint: Allows you to specify a database-specific datatype.

length.label: Length
length.name: length
length.hint: The character length of the database field.

notnull.label: Notnull
notnull.name: notnull
notnull.hint: Specifies if the database field can have null values.  Default is false.

precision.label: Precision
precision.name: precision
precision.hint: An integer value denoting the number of digits allowed in a numeric field (including digits after the decimal point).

scale.label: Scale
scale.name: scale
scale.hint: Specifies the number of digits to the right of the decimal point.

dbdefault.label: Dbdefault
dbdefault.name: dbdefault
dbdefault.hint: Sets a default value for this field in the database table.

unique.label: Unique
unique.name: unique
unique.hint: Denotes whether the database field should only accept unique values.  Default is false.

uniquekey.label: Uniquekey
uniquekey.name: uniquekey
uniquekey.hint: Allows you to provide a name for the constraint created for the 'unique' parameter.

persistent.label: Persistent
persistent.name: persistent
persistent.hint: Only set this to false if you do not want this property persisted in the database as a record column.

insert.label: Insert
insert.name: insert
insert.hint: Determines whether the property should be included in the database INSERT statement / when object record is inserted. Setting both 'insert' and 'update' to false makes the property read-only.

update.label: Update
update.name: update
update.hint: Determines whether the property should be included in the database UPDATE statement / when object record is updated. Setting both 'insert' and 'update' to false makes the property read-only.
